verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass in those days הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> those וַיִּקְבְּצ֨וּ <S%H6908><s%> together פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <S%H6430><s%> that the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4264><s%> their armies לַצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> for warfare לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> with Israel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָכִישׁ֙ <S%H397><s%> And Achish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David יָדֹ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> Know תֵּדַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> thou assuredly כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִתִּי֙ <S%H854><s%> that תֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> that thou shalt go out בַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> with me to battle אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you וַאֲנָשֶֽׁיךָ׃ <S%H376><s%> and your men

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָכִ֔ישׁ <S%H397><s%> to Achish לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> Surely אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you תֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> thou shalt know אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> can do עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> what thy servant וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָכִישׁ֙ <S%H397><s%> And Achish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> to David לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> well שֹׁמֵ֧ר <S%H8104><s%> thee keeper לְרֹאשִׁ֛י <S%H7218><s%> of mine head אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֖ <S%H7760><s%> Therefore will I make כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> for ever פ

וּשְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H8050><s%> Now Samuel מֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <S%H5594><s%> had lamented לוֹ֙ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <S%H6912><s%> him and buried בָרָמָ֖ה <S%H7414><s%> him in Ramah וּבְעִיר֑וֹ <S%H5892><s%> even in his own city וְשָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul הֵסִ֛יר <S%H5493><s%> had put away הָאֹב֥וֹת <S%H178><s%> those that had familiar spirits וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֖ים <S%H3049><s%> and the wizards מֵהָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> out of the land

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> gathered themselves together פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְשׁוּנֵ֑ם <S%H7766><s%> in Shunem וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <S%H6908><s%> together שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> and Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> all Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and they pitched בַּגִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <S%H1533><s%> in Gilboa

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> And when Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיִּרָ֕א <S%H3372><s%> he was afraid וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <S%H2729><s%> trembled לִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> and his heart מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> greatly

וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <S%H7592><s%> enquired שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And when Saul בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָנָ֖הוּ <S%H6030><s%> answered יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD גַּ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> either בַּחֲלֹמ֛וֹת <S%H2472><s%> him not neither by dreams גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> or בָּאוּרִ֖ים <S%H224><s%> nor by Urim גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> or בַּנְּבִיאִֽם׃ <S%H5030><s%> nor by prophets

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul לַעֲבָדָ֗יו <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants בַּקְּשׁוּ־ <S%H1245><s%> Seek לִי֙ אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> me a woman בַּעֲלַת־ <S%H1172><s%> that hath א֔וֹב <S%H178><s%> a familiar spirit וְאֵלְכָ֥ה <S%H1980><s%> may go אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> about וְאֶדְרְשָׁה־ <S%H1875><s%> to her and enquire בָּ֑הּ וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> said עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> of her And his servants אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> to him Behold [there is] a woman בַּֽעֲלַת־ <S%H1172><s%> that hath א֖וֹב <S%H178><s%> a familiar spirit בְּעֵ֥ין דּֽוֹר׃ <S%H5874><s%> at Endor

וַיִּתְחַפֵּ֣שׂ <S%H2664><s%> disguised שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul וַיִּלְבַּשׁ֙ <S%H3847><s%> himself and put on בְּגָדִ֣ים <S%H899><s%> raiment אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּשְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> and two אֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> men עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> and they וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> with him and they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> to the woman לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said [קָסֹומִי־ כ] (קָֽסֳמִי־ <S%H7080><s%> Conjure נָ֥א <S%H7080><s%> I pray thee divine ק) לִי֙ בָּא֔וֹב <S%H178><s%> unto me by the familiar spirit וְהַ֣עֲלִי <S%H5927><s%> and bring me [him] up לִ֔י אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> whom I shall name אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> unto him Behold thou knowest אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> what Saul אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> how הִכְרִ֛ית <S%H3772><s%> how he hath cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹב֥וֹת <S%H178><s%> those that have familiar spirits וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֖י <S%H3049><s%> and the wizards מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land וְלָמָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> Why אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you מִתְנַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H5367><s%> wherefore then layest thou a snare בְּנַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> for my life לַהֲמִיתֵֽנִי׃ <S%H4191><s%> to cause me to die

וַיִּשָּׁ֤בַֽע <S%H7650><s%> sware לָהּ֙ שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> to her by the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> there shall יִקְּרֵ֥ךְ <S%H7136><s%> happen עָוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> no punishment בַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> to thee for this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> Then said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> the woman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Whom אַֽעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> Whom shall I bring up לָּ֑ךְ וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto thee? And he said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel הַֽעֲלִי־ <S%H5927><s%> Bring me up לִֽי׃

וַתֵּ֤רֶא <S%H7200><s%> saw הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> And when the woman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel וַתִּזְעַ֖ק <S%H2199><s%> she cried בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a loud וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> spake הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H802><s%> and the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֧וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul לֵאמֹ֛ר <S%H559><s%> saying לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why רִמִּיתָ֖נִי <S%H7411><s%> Why hast thou deceived וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> me? for thou [art] Saul

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָ֥הּ הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְאִ֖י <S%H3372><s%> unto her Be not afraid כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> but מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> what רָאִ֑ית <S%H7200><s%> for what sawest וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> thou? And the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I saw עֹלִ֥ים <S%H5927><s%> ascending מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> out of the earth

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לָהּ֙ מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> to her What תָּאֳר֔וֹ <S%H8389><s%> unto her What form וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> [is] he of? And she said אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man זָקֵן֙ <S%H2205><s%> An old עֹלֶ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> cometh up וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he עֹטֶ֖ה <S%H5844><s%> and he [is] covered מְעִ֑יל <S%H4598><s%> with a mantle וַיֵּ֤דַע <S%H3045><s%> perceived שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And Saul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it was שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H8050><s%> that it [was] Samuel ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he וַיִּקֹּ֥ד <S%H6915><s%> and he stooped אַפַּ֛יִם <S%H639><s%> with [his] face אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the ground וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why הִרְגַּזְתַּ֖נִי <S%H7264><s%> Why hast thou disquieted לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> me to bring me up אֹתִ֑י <S%H853><s%> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered שָׁ֠אוּל <S%H7586><s%> ? And Saul צַר־ <S%H6887><s%> distressed לִ֨י מְאֹ֜ד <S%H3966><s%> I am sore וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים ׀ <S%H6430><s%> for the Philistines נִלְחָמִ֣ים <S%H3898><s%> make war בִּ֗י וֵֽאלֹהִ֞ים <S%H430><s%> against me and God סָ֤ר <S%H5493><s%> is departed מֵֽעָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no עָנָ֣נִי <S%H6030><s%> from me and answereth ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> either בְּיַֽד־ <S%H3027><s%> me no more neither by הַנְּבִיאִם֙ <S%H5030><s%> prophets גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> or בַּ֣חֲלֹמ֔וֹת <S%H2472><s%> nor by dreams וָאֶקְרָאֶ֣ה <S%H7121><s%> therefore I have called לְךָ֔ לְהוֹדִיעֵ֖נִי <S%H3045><s%> thee that thou mayest make known מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> what אֶעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto me what I shall do ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel וְלָ֖מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִּשְׁאָלֵ֑נִי <S%H7592><s%> Wherefore then dost thou ask וַיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of me seeing the LORD סָ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> is departed מֵעָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and has וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become עָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6145><s%> enemy

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> hath done יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD ל֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> to him as he spake בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> by me וַיִּקְרַ֨ע <S%H7167><s%> hath rent יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom מִיָּדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> out of thine hand וַֽיִּתְּנָ֖הּ <S%H5414><s%> and given לְרֵעֲךָ֥ <S%H7453><s%> it to thy neighbour לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> [even] to David

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> thou obeyedst בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> not the voice יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not עָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> nor executedst חֲרוֹן־ <S%H2740><s%> his fierce אַפּ֖וֹ <S%H639><s%> wrath בַּעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> upon Amalek עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this עָשָֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> done לְךָ֥ יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> therefore hath the LORD הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto thee this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְיִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> will also deliver יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Moreover the LORD גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> will also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עִמְּךָ֙ <S%H5973><s%> along בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> with thee into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וּמָחָ֕ר <S%H4279><s%> and to morrow אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> [shalt] thou and thy sons עִמִּ֑י <S%H5973><s%> along גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> Indeed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> the host יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> also shall deliver יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] with me the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַיְמַהֵ֣ר <S%H4116><s%> straightway שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> Then Saul וַיִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> fell מְלֹא־ <S%H4393><s%> all קֽוֹמָתוֹ֙ <S%H6967><s%> along אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> on the earth וַיִּרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> afraid מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> and was sore מִדִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> because of the words שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> of Samuel גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also כֹּ֙חַ֙ <S%H3581><s%> and there was no strength לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> become ב֔וֹ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> no אָכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> in him for he had eaten לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> no bread כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> nor all the night

וַתָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> came הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> And the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul וַתֵּ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and saw כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִבְהַ֣ל <S%H926><s%> troubled מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> that he was sore וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שָׁמְעָ֤ה <S%H8085><s%> hath obeyed שִׁפְחָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H8198><s%> unto him Behold thine handmaid בְּקוֹלֶ֔ךָ <S%H6963><s%> thy voice וָאָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> and I have put נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> my life בְּכַפִּ֔י <S%H3709><s%> in my hand וָֽאֶשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> and have hearkened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H1697><s%> unto thy words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> which thou spakest אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now שְׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> Now therefore I pray thee hearken נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> please גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> thou also unto the voice שִׁפְחָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H8198><s%> of thine handmaid וְאָשִׂ֧מָה <S%H7760><s%> and let me set לְפָנֶ֛יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before פַּת־ <S%H6595><s%> a morsel לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread וֶאֱכ֑וֹל <S%H398><s%> thee and eat וִיהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> and have בְךָ֙ כֹּ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> that thou mayest have strength כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> when תֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> on thy way

וַיְמָאֵ֗ן <S%H3985><s%> But he refused וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֹכַ֔ל <S%H398><s%> I will not eat וַיִּפְרְצוּ־ <S%H6555><s%> compelled ב֤וֹ עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> But his servants וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> together הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> together with the woman וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> him and he hearkened לְקֹלָ֑ם <S%H6963><s%> unto their voice וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> So he arose מֵֽהָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and sat אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַמִּטָּֽה׃ <S%H4296><s%> upon the bed

וְלָאִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman עֵֽגֶל־ <S%H5695><s%> calf מַרְבֵּק֙ <S%H4770><s%> had a fat בַּבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> in the house וַתְּמַהֵ֖ר <S%H4116><s%> and she hasted וַתִּזְבָּחֵ֑הוּ <S%H2076><s%> and killed וַתִּקַּח־ <S%H3947><s%> it and took קֶ֣מַח <S%H7058><s%> flour וַתָּ֔לָשׁ <S%H3888><s%> and kneaded וַתֹּפֵ֖הוּ <S%H644><s%> [it] and did bake מַצּֽוֹת׃ <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread

וַתַּגֵּ֧שׁ <S%H5066><s%> And she brought לִפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> [it] before שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and before עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants וַיֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> and they did eat וַיָּקֻ֥מוּ <S%H6965><s%> Then they rose up וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> that night הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he פ
